title: Does anyone have a solution for this huge ping spike?
body:
Every once in awhile I get a massive ping spike, it's duration can range anywhere from 5 to 10 minutes, but afterwards, everything's fine. Unfortunately, those 10 minutes puts me extremely behind, fewer cs, less XP, and I end up losing my lane.

It has nothing to do with my internet if I didn't mention this before.

Does anyone have a potential fix for this?

replies.body:
Even if your internet runs flawlessly outside of League, there could still be something preventing your network from reaching our game servers without interruptions. I'd like to have you go over the steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) first, if not just to rule out those possible fixes.

Let me know how this helps.
